column1: Missing Dispose call on local IDisposable
column2: Methods that create objects of type 'IDisposable' should call 'Dispose' on those objects, otherwise unmanaged resources may not be released.
column4: Disposable 'StreamReader' is created here but is not disposed.

column2: Catching all exceptions with a generic catch clause may be overly broad, which can make errors harder to diagnose.
